articles.title: U.S. airports rumble back to life after FAA computer outage - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. flights were slowly beginning to resume departures and a ground stop was lifted after the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) scrambled to fix a system outage overnight that had forced a halt to all U.S. departing flights.
